attributes.review:
Honestly when I tried to download this app, for some reason it took several hours. When I tried to pause it or delete it, nothing happened, the app has a mind of its own, not literally of course, but this is all a fraud! This is not like normal apps i don’t know why it did that but upon to use up all my time and my phones battery to finally download once I opened the app, it immediately asked for my number. I do not want to give my number to some random app I cannot even delete. Giving this app your phone number is letting the government track all your personal data! After I tried using a fake number to see what goes on in the app it sent it a verification code, which is even worse! I do no approve of the fact that it has to hack into our personal data. This app has been messing with my head for several days considering the fact that I can’t even delete it! Also I tried typing in the verification code to see what’s up, and to realize that you need a 10 digit code is ridiculous! I am furious! I finally decided to put in my number because I wanted to get into the app, one I entered the ridiculously long 10 digit code, the screen was black and it turned white all of a sudden and blinded me not being able to see for a solid 12 seconds, after I regained my vision, nothing happened. My phone started to lag and then immediately turned off when I tried leaving the app. I turned my phone back on and to my surprise, I had to enter my phone number and code again, when I realized it was the same code as before I decided to try this on my sisters phone, and it did the exact same thing! Well now we both have screwed up phones due to this issue. I do not suggest downloading this app! YOU WILL NEVER BE ABLE TO GET RID OF IT!!!  
                          Sincerely,
                                 A very stressed and concerned politician.
attributes.title: Do not dowload this app!!

attributes.review:
I wanted to support my amazing president by getting his app on my brand new phone❤️❤️. It took over 3 years to download. When it fully downloaded, I got a notification from Apple saying that this app was taking my information and was trying to hack my phone 😡. But I didn’t care, that’s where it went all wrong😳. The next day, I opened the app and on every TV Burnie Sanders was there 😖.He said that I was his “number one supporter” which is wrong🤬🤬. And when I yelled at the TV for saying that all the alarms in my house started going off🤯🤯. All of a sudden, the CIA busted down my door and tried to arrest me for war crimes 😱😱😱.Anyways, I explained what happened and they left🙄🙄🙄. DONT BUY THIS APP!!!!😀😃😄😁😆😅😂🤣☺️😊😇🙂🙃😉😌😍🥰😘😗😙😚😋😛😝😜🤪🤨🧐🤓😎🤩🥳😏😒😞😔😟😕🙁☹️😣😖😫😩🥺😢😭😤😠😡🤬🤯😳🥵🥶😱😨😰😥😓🤗🤔🤭🤫🤥😶😐😑😬🙄😯😦😧😮😲🥱😴🤤😪😵🤐🥴🤢🤮🤧😷🤒🤕🤑🤠😈👿👹👺🤡💩👻💀☠️👽👾🤖🎃😺😸😹😻😼😽🙀😿😾🤲👐🙌👏🤝👍👎👊✊🤛🤜🤞✌️🤟🤘👌🤏👈👉👆👇☝️✋🤚🖐🖖👋🤙💪🦾🖕✍️🙏🦶🦵🦿💄💋👄🦷👅👂🦻👃👣👁👀🗣👤👥👶👧🧒👩🧑👨👩‍🦱🧑‍🦱👨‍🦱👩‍🦰🧑‍🦰👨‍🦰👱‍♀️👱👱‍♂️👩‍🦳🧑‍🦳👨‍🦳👩‍🦲🧑‍🦲👨‍🦲🧔👵🧓👴👲👳‍♀️👳👳‍♂️🧕👮‍♀️👮👮‍♂️👷‍♀️👷👷‍♂️💂‍♀️💂💂‍♂️🕵️‍♀️🕵️🕵️‍♂️👩‍⚕️🧑‍⚕️👨‍⚕️👩‍🌾🧑‍🌾👨‍🌾👩‍🍳🧑‍🍳👨‍🍳👩‍🎓🧑‍🎓👨‍🎓👩‍🎤🧑‍🎤👨‍🎤👩‍🏫🧑‍🏫👩‍🏭🧑‍🏭👨‍🏭👩‍💻🧑‍💻👨‍💻👩‍💼🧑‍💼👨‍💼👩‍🔧🧑‍🔧👨‍🔧👩‍🔬🧑‍🔬👨‍🔬🧑‍🎨👨‍🎨👩‍🚒🧑‍🚒👨‍🚒👩‍✈️🧑‍✈️👨‍✈️👩‍🚀🧑‍🚀👨‍🚀👩‍⚖️🧑‍⚖️👨‍⚖️👰🤵👸🤴🦸‍♀️🦸🦸‍♂️🦹‍♀️🦹🦹‍♂️🤶🎅🧙‍♀️🧙🧙‍♂️🧝‍♀️

When you RIGHT in you number it say you have HAVE to go to his website and BUY a trump shirts... * gives Debby Ryan look*... it also says we have to text or call him WITCH is highly disgusting because is howeVER a married man once AGAIN😤 THEY ARE ALSO TRYING TO BRIBE US. It specifically says here “ would you like to help out president trump win in 2020? you will win a prize if you do!” “Help president trump win by registering for rallies and events” it howeVER says “check-in for EVENTS and share apps with friends” “if you do that you will earn points and upgrade” first of what do we need to upgrade. It asks you for your first and last name. Your email and zip code. Second off what in the world do you need my email and zip code. attributes.review: This app took 12 HOURS TO DOWNLOAD. 😡😡😡 I felt like my freedom was being taken away!!!! by wasting my time waiting for this app to finish downloading!!! Once it finished, it kept SPAZZING like it had a SEIZURE and random pictures of an ORANGE kept showing up like I was in an evil RAVE PARTY👹😈 It was so horrendous I started to get VERTIGO 🥴 and all I kept seeing was 🍊💨🍊💨🍊💨🍊💨🍊💨 like I was in a merry go round 🎠🎠🎠 I did NOT sign up to be in a carnival. 0/2020 STARS I WOULD DEFINITELY NOT RECOMMEND!!!!!!!!😤😭
attributes.title: THE WORST APP EVER

attributes.review:
PLEASE LISTEN UP LISTEN 👂 ⚠️
 I downloaded it to check wats up with my non racist non homophobic non Cheeto non mean president.and when I opened the app all my TVs turned on and started playing the news meanwhile that was happening my 3 fishes what a seizure and died my cat also ran away and the Uber driver that was gonna pick me up turned into an Uber eats worker in front of me and gave me Cheetos 🙄🤡 my shirt that had my aunts painting pic turned into a Trump pic and my house turned from white to orange 😡🎃 also all my family pictures had trump faces all over them and I was eating a salad and it turned into little paper that said “vote for trumpitis” worst of all is that all of my family members in a family chat said that everything that happened to me happened to them also later that day when I tried to delete that app my phone was getting spammed by “vote for trump “and videos of trump  and my wallpaper turned into trumps face and there were a bunch of orange 🍊 apps anyways I’m REALLY REALLY MAD 😡

attributes.title: DO NOT DOWNLOAD THIS APP!!!!

attributes.review: FURIOUS WITH THE APP. first of all, it took 19 hours to simply download! once the app was on my phone, it asked for my information and i got hacked. suddenly trump was in MY HOME for no absolute reason. then this cheeto proceded to DROWN my fish. it was so rude of him. i began to yell at him bc i was so mad about the situation like who drowns a fish?!! disgusting behavior. anyways, after the peaceful funeral i held for my beloved i sent trump on his way but he WOULDN'T LEAVE. i was so confused but i thought to myself “girl maybe if u delete the app it’ll delete him too.” i was like “girl omg ur so smart.” 😜 i then took strong actions and attempted to delete the app. HE TACKLED ME.. yes TACKLED. absolutely furious with him i had to call reinforcements. barron trump stepped in and did a wonderful job. although the cheeto is disgusting his son is quite beautiful (hmu when u 18 bby😻🙈). anywaysssss w barrons help i was able to FINALLY delete the app. it was quite the experience i had and i’m sure you’ll go trough it too if u download this horrid app. oh and if u have a fish make sure to hide it or he’ll drown it too 😔 DO NOT GET THE APP GUYS!!
attributes.title: ✨horrid app✨
